Actually, knockback is optional now, so you can quake and keep your enemies close to do it again next then
May 31, 2022
Bobcat2022
I haven't really locked on to the whole 'multi-target close combat thing' yet. Probably wouldn't use it until the Blades clicks; on the front end, Quake will do two-to-each just as well, plus Knockback. I guess you could use multi-targets instead of Quake if you wanted to avoid causing Knockback? Anyway, yeah, total close-combat queen, she makes Killmonger look bad by standing next to him, same stuff everyone else is saying.
May 2, 2022
Goop
Now that you can use Quake+Exploit+CCE (just for the +1atk), this is a very good piece for the pts. The healing special power is just a bonus. In the later dial a lot of the powers combo together with exploit also, this is a power common for sure.
